classes.docstring:
"""
    Standard file system storage for static files.

    The defaults for ``location`` and ``base_url`` are
    ``STATIC_ROOT`` and ``STATIC_URL``.
    """
classes.name: StaticFilesStorage

classes.docstring:
"""
    A static file system storage backend which also saves
    hashed copies of the files it saves.
    """
classes.name: ManifestStaticFilesStorage

modules.docstring:
"""
Views and functions for serving static files. These are only to be used during
development, and SHOULD NOT be used in a production setting.

"""

classes.docstring:
"""
    Extend django.test.LiveServerTestCase to transparently overlay at test
    execution-time the assets provided by the staticfiles app finders. This
    means you don't need to run collectstatic before or as a part of your tests
    setup.
    """
classes.name: StaticLiveServerTestCase

classes.docstring:
"""
    Common methods used by WSGI and ASGI handlers.
    """
classes.name: StaticFilesHandlerMixin

classes.docstring:
"""
    WSGI middleware that intercepts calls to the static files directory, as
    defined by the STATIC_URL setting, and serves those files.
    """
classes.name: StaticFilesHandler

classes.docstring:
"""
    ASGI application which wraps another and intercepts requests for static
    files, passing them off to Django's static file serving.
    """
classes.name: ASGIStaticFilesHandler

classes.docstring:
"""
    A base file finder to be used for custom staticfiles finder classes.
    """
classes.name: BaseFinder

classes.docstring:
"""
    A static files finder that uses the ``STATICFILES_DIRS`` setting
    to locate files.
    """
classes.name: FileSystemFinder

classes.docstring:
"""
    A static files finder that looks in the directory of each app as
    specified in the source_dir attribute.
    """
classes.name: AppDirectoriesFinder

classes.docstring:
"""
    A base static files finder to be used to extended
    with an own storage class.
    """
classes.name: BaseStorageFinder

classes.docstring:
"""
    A static files finder that uses the default storage backend.
    """
classes.name: DefaultStorageFinder
